symptoms.name: Multiple lesions on face and scalp

physical_findings: Scaling, erythematous rash on right cheek, forehead, and scalp
risk_factors: Dust exposure in endemic areas (occupational and recreational activities)
Intense exposure to aerosolized arthroconidia (agricultural or construction workers, outdoor activities)

imaging_findings.Chest CT: Multiple pulmonary nodules consistent with a history of coccidioidomycosis infection

supportive: Clinical presentation (e.g., facial rash, scaling, erythematous lesions)
Positive serological tests (e.g., IgM, IgG, complement fixation)
